meanings.definition: A group of chemical compounds consisting of benzene rings with one or more chlorine atoms attached.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the effects of chlorobenzenes on the environment.
meanings.sent2: Factories must follow regulations when disposing of chlorobenzenes.
meanings.sent3: The chlorobenzenes decided to throw a pool party with their chlorine friends.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening bloomed like chlorobenzenes in a field of flowers.
meanings.sent5: The smell of chlorobenzenes lingered in the air, reminding her of the lab.
